00080 class String : public virtual Object {
00081     friend bool operator==(const String lhs, const String rhs);

00569

00574     mutable Data * strdata;

00578 bool operator==(const String lhs, const String rhs);
00579 
00580 template<>
00581 struct Hash<String> {
00582 
00583     inline sint operator()(String s) {
00584         suint hash = 0;
00585         suint x = 0;
00586         suint i = 0;
00587         uchar * b = s.strdata->data.carray();
00588 
00589         for(i = 0; i < s.length(); b++, i++) {
00590             hash = (hash << 4) + (*b);
00591             if((x = hash & 0xF0000000L) != 0) {
00592                 hash ^= (x >> 24);
00593             }
00594             hash &= ~x;
00595         }
00596 
00597         return hash;
00598     }
00599 };
00600 
00601 inline bool operator==(const String lhs, const char* rhs) {
00602     return operator==(lhs, String(rhs));
00603 }
00604 
00605 inline bool operator==(const char* rhs, const String lhs) {
00606     return operator==(String(rhs), lhs);
00607 }
